markdownRemark.excerpt: Sharing today … Quote: Jesus never change. Yet, knowing Him changes everything. Passage: Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today, and forever! Hebrews 13:8
markdownRemark.html:
Sharing today …

Quote:

Jesus never change. Yet, knowing Him changes everything.

Passage:

Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today, and forever!
[Hebrews 13:8]
